name: Mage's Quest
description:
Made in three days for the GMC Jam 38, the theme being three simple rules!

Life isn't fair sometimes... You make a little innocent mistake and you find yourself exiled in a dangerous unkown land, having to follow absurde rules in order to reach forgiveness. Your quest is merciless and the odds are against you, but... after all... you are the royal mage for a reason! 

Collect all the power orbs and prove your king that you do deserve to keep your life! But beware! You don't have much... time.
